meanings: (답·계산·사실 등이) (잘못되다) be wrong, be incorrect, be mistaken, (잘못하다) make a mistake (in), commit[make] an error (in)
의견 말하기 I see we have our differences.
의견 말하기 We're not seeing eye to eye on the matter.
의견 말하기 There seems to be a disagreement.

vlive.korean: 넌 무슨 갔던 길을 틀려? How can you not know your way? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 짝사랑이 이루어질 수 있을까 [연애미수] EP09
vlive.english: How can you not know your way?

vlive.korean: 원래 '5월의 밤'도 틀려고 했었는데... I wanted to play "May," too. 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 홍나잇⭐ (feat.홍중이의 플레이리스트)
[너무 많이 틀려요!] 되게 많이 틀려요 형 진짜 이적 밴드 했어요, 안 했어요? You make too many mistakes. Did you play for Lee Juck, or not? 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP18 #천생사랑꾼 #뜻밖의공통점 #사람잡는두성
vlive.english: You make too many mistakes. Did you play for Lee Juck, or not?

vlive.korean: 그래서 제가 이 노래를 틀려고 하는데요 같이 한번 들어볼까요? So I chose this song. Let's take a listen together. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 38
vlive.english: So I chose this song. Let's take a listen together.

vlive.korean: 마지막 노래 틀려고 하는데 혹시 듣고 싶은 노래 있나요? I'm about to play our last song. Do you have anything you want to listen to? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 46
vlive.english: I'm about to play our last song. Do you have anything you want to listen to?
